mapper.sql: sys_id, order_no, entity_id, user_id, appointment_cates, related_no, appoint_date, time_from, time_to, address, status, institution_id, department_id, service_option, appraisal, is_cancelled, creation_time, create_by, edit_time, edit_by
mapper.select:
select ub.user_id,-- id ub.head_image, ub.full_name,-- 姓名 ub.gender,-- 性别 TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, ub.date_of_birth, CURDATE()) AS user_age,-- 年龄 oa.entity_id,-- 企业编号 sent.entity_name,-- 公司名称 ufd.effect_to,-- 截至时间 oa.status, -- 状态 ub.is_hr from order_appointment as oa LEFT JOIN user_basic as ub ON oa.user_id=ub.user_id LEFT JOIN user_family_doctor as ufd ON oa.user_id=ufd.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_entity as sent ON oa.entity_id=sent.entity_id
where oa.related_no=#{params.relatedNo} and oa.status=1

SELECT ub.full_name, ub.gender, ub.head_image, oa.is_cancelled, oa.order_no, oa.address, oa.appoint_date, oai.amount, FLOOR(DATEDIFF(now(), ub.date_of_birth)/365.2422) age FROM order_appointment oa LEFT JOIN user_basic ub on oa.user_id = ub.user_id LEFT JOIN order_additional_info oai on oai.order_no = oa.order_no LEFT JOIN exam_handover_sheet ehs on ehs.order_no = oa.order_no where oa.related_no = #{params.nurseNo}
and ehs.person_barcode_confirmed = 0 AND ehs.draw_completed = 0 AND ehs.is_handovered = 0 and oa.is_cancelled = 0
and ehs.person_barcode_confirmed = 1 AND ehs.is_handovered = 0 and oa.is_cancelled = 0
and oa.is_cancelled = 1
and ehs.person_barcode_confirmed = 1 AND ehs.draw_completed = 1 AND ehs.is_handovered = 1 and oa.is_cancelled = 0
AND YEARWEEK(date_format(oa.creation_time,'%Y-%m-%d')) = YEARWEEK(now())
AND DATE_FORMAT(oa.creation_time, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT(CURDATE(),'%Y%m')
AND to_days(oa.creation_time) = to_days(now())

select ub.user_id,-- id ub.head_image, ub.full_name,-- 姓名 ub.gender,-- 性别 TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, ub.date_of_birth, CURDATE()) AS user_age,-- 年龄 oa.entity_id,-- 企业编号 sent.entity_name,-- 公司名称 ufd.effect_to,-- 截至时间 oa.status, -- 状态 oa.order_no, ub.is_hr -- 标识为用户 from order_appointment as oa LEFT JOIN user_basic as ub ON oa.user_id=ub.user_id LEFT JOIN user_family_doctor as ufd ON oa.user_id=ufd.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_entity as sent ON oa.entity_id=sent.entity_id where oa.related_no=#{params.relatedNo} and oa.status=#{params.status} and oa.appointment_cates=5
and ub.full_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{params.name}, '%')
UNION select eha.user_id,-- id ub.head_image, ub.full_name,-- 姓名 ub.gender,-- 性别 TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, ub.date_of_birth, CURDATE()) AS user_age, eha.entity_no, -- 企业编号 sent.entity_name,-- 公司名称 epm.effect_to,-- 截至时间 eha.status, eha.order_no, ub.is_hr -- 标识为企业 from entity_healthy_appointment as eha LEFT JOIN user_basic as ub ON eha.user_id=ub.user_id LEFT JOIN entity_purchse_main as epm ON eha.entity_no=epm.entity_no LEFT JOIN sys_entity as sent ON eha.entity_no=sent.entity_id WHERE eha.related_no=#{params.relatedNo} and eha.status=#{params.status} and eha.pkg_main_id=8 and eha.pkg_detail_id=801
and ub.full_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{params.name}, '%')
mapper.update: update order_appointment SET status=#{status} WHERE order_no=#{orderNo}
mapper.select: select ub.is_hr,-- 标识 eha.user_id,-- id ub.head_image, ub.full_name,-- 姓名 ub.gender,-- 性别 TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR, ub.date_of_birth, CURDATE()) AS user_age, eha.entity_no,-- 企业编号 sent.entity_name,-- 公司名称 ub.id_card_no,-- 身份证号 uc.card_no,-- 医保卡号 epm.effect_to-- 截至时间 from entity_healthy_appointment as eha LEFT JOIN user_basic as ub ON eha.user_id=ub.user_id LEFT JOIN user_cards as uc ON ub.user_id = uc.user_id LEFT JOIN entity_purchse_main as epm ON eha.entity_no=epm.entity_no LEFT JOIN sys_entity as sent ON eha.entity_no=sent.entity_id WHERE eha.user_id=#{userId} and eha.status=1

select err.byh, err.report_no,-- 报告编号 err.review_no,-- 解读人 ub.user_id,-- 用户编号 ub.head_image,-- 头像 eir.BRXM,-- 报告人 eir.BRXB,-- 性别 eir.BRNL,-- 年龄 eir.BGLX,-- 报告类型 -- ,-- 项目名称 eir.SHSJ,-- 报告生成时间 err.status-- 报告状态 FROM exam_report_review as err LEFT JOIN exam_inspect_report as eir ON err.report_no=eir.report_no LEFT JOIN user_basic as ub ON ub.user_id=SUBSTRING_INDEX(err.byh,'^',-1) WHERE ub.user_id=#{params.userId}
mapper.update: update order_appointment SET is_cancelled=#{isCancelled} WHERE order_no=#{orderNo}
mapper.select: SELECT oa.sys_id, oa.order_no, oa.entity_id, oa.user_id, oa.address, oa.appointment_cates, oa.appoint_date, oa.status, si.`name` institutionName, oa.institution_id, oa.is_cancelled, oa.related_no, oa.service_option, oa.time_from FROM order_appointment oa LEFT JOIN sys_institution si on si.institution_id = oa.institution_id WHERE oa.order_no = #{params.orderNo} and oa.is_cancelled = 0
SELECT oa.order_no, oa.appoint_date, oa.address, sd.cellphone_no FROM order_appointment as oa LEFT JOIN sys_doctor as sd ON sd.doctor_no=oa.related_no WHERE oa.order_no=#{orderNo}

SELECT oc.user_cates, ub.full_name as userName, ub.gender as userSex, ub.id_card_no as userIdCard, ub.cellphone_no as userPhone, uc.card_no as userDocCard from order_customer as oc LEFT JOIN user_basic as ub ON ub.user_id=oc.relative_id LEFT JOIN user_cards as uc ON uc.user_id=oc.relative_id where oc.order_no=#{orderNo} and oc.user_cates=1

SELECT oc.user_cates, ur.relative_name as relatedName, ur.gender as relatedSex, ur.id_card_no as relatedIdCard, ur.cellphone_no as relatedPhone, uc.card_no as relatedDocCard from order_customer as oc LEFT JOIN user_relatives as ur ON ur.relative_id=oc.relative_id LEFT JOIN user_cards as uc ON uc.user_id=oc.relative_id where oc.order_no=#{orderNo} and oc.user_cates=2
